original_text: When Jesus saw him lying there and knew that he had already been there a long time, he said to him, “Do you want to be healed?”
korean_text: 예수께서 그 누운 것을 보시고 병이 벌써 오래된 줄 아시고 이르시되 네가 낫고자 하느냐

sentences.original_text: When Jesus saw him lying there
sentences.korean_translation: 예수님께서 그가 거기 누워 있는 것을 보셨을 때

sentences.original_text: and knew that he had already been there a long time
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그가 이미 오랫동안 거기 있었음을 아시고
